cardsOne.title: A Little Bit About Me
cardsOne.description: Hi, my name is Richard. I'm a 21-year-old student at the Slovak Technical University. Before coming to the university, I was a semi-professional athlete competing in canoe-sprint and participating in multiple international events.

cardsOne.title: Why I Chose to Study Computer Science
cardsOne.description: I chose to study computer science and technology because I have a passion for this field. I'm interested in the process of creating software, websites, and other computer assets. What I love about this field is that I can learn logical patterns and use them to build complex projects.

cardsOne.title: From Sports to Computer Science
cardsOne.description: My interest in computer science started when I was 15 years old. I came across 3D modeling software called Blender while watching videos about games. While I didn't end up writing code in Blender, I became curious about the process of making games. I started learning the C# programming language and discovered the Unity software. This led me to create a game called 'Mark Ball,' which is available for download on the Google Play Store.

cardsTwo.title: Early Experiences
cardsTwo.description: In high school, I specialized in informatics. During that time, I studied the Python programming language and worked on several projects. I used Flask and learned basic web technologies like HTML and CSS, as well as experimented with various frameworks. After high school, I had a summer job and later an internship at Slovanet, where I worked on custom modules for the Odoo (ERP) system. I also worked on SEO optimization and website performance improvement projects.

cardsTwo.title: My latest experience
cardsTwo.description: During first year in university i gained a lot of new knowledge from practice and also teoretical information. We learned for example how bigger projects are made, we did discuss OOP deeper, and more abstract part of bigger projects. What i learned in school i was able to see in company that i worked for. In work i practiced my skills of python where i have met first time xml. During school we worked on multiple projects where we used C, JavaScript, Shell Scripting and i worked with one lecturer on special project that was aimed on SEO.
